synopsis.text: After confessing their feelings for one another, Ryou and Souma have happily begun a romantic relationship. However, their newfound bliss is disrupted when Ryou's ex-boyfriend Rei suddenly reappears in her life. Although Ryou initially resists getting entangled with Rei again, unresolved feelings from their past may complicate matters. As Ryou, Souma, and Rei are reminded of the emotional entanglements from their school days, tensions rise. Ryou aims to remain committed to Souma, but Rei's resurfacing sparks self-doubt. She finds herself unexpectedly collaborating with her ex despite not wanting to jeopardize her current relationship. Will Ryou's connection to Souma prevail? Or will buried emotions from her past with Rei take hold instead? This love triangle reignites as Ryou determines the direction of her heart.
